translated: Volume 17 of the Collection of Writings from Jin Ting
Written by Qi Song, a monk from Dongshan in Jin Ting, Teng Prefecture
60 Ancient Regulated Poems (17) 60 Ancient Regulated Poems
Poems by Three Eminent Monks, with an Introduction by Monk Jiao Ran of the Tang Dynasty, Ling Che, and Dao Biao.
They were known for their virtue in Wu and Yue.
Therefore, a saying praises them:
Zou's Day can be clear and elegant.
Yue's Che is like ice and snow.
Hang's Biao soars into the clouds.
I have heard of them and admire their people.
Because of the saying,
I wrote three chapters of poems.
To expand their meaning.
Zou's Day can be clear and elegant. Day Gong's writings are clear and elegant.
Heaven gave him this ability, it cannot be disputed.
Monks have studied literature since ancient times.
Zou is the foremost.
Although creation and transformation change, the spirit does not move.
Day Gong's poetry is the same.
Above, it crosses the Sao and Ya, below, it sinks into the Song.
His outstanding thoughts are unrestrained, and the Way is complete in himself.
The Chan masters cultivate literature, and Xiu or Hui is not in vain.
They guide people's minds and penetrate the Buddha's principles.
The gentlemen and scholars, the Ru Gong group,
Early stepped into the clear wandering, admiring the outside of the square.
These people have already passed away, but these words remain.
Protecting the Dharma should be passed down for ten thousand generations.
Yue's Che is like ice and snow, Che's purity is like ice and snow.
The high monk's natural endowments are different from others.
At thirty, he was already famous for his poetry.
His name is in the poetry stream, but his mind is in the precepts.
He is not inferior to Hui Yuan, but superior to Hui Xiu.
Who can be compared to Jiao Ran?
The white clouds are scattered, where is the fixed abode?
Suddenly entering the Guanzhong area to visit Bao and Li.
Being alone and pure is difficult to stand, and is opposed by the crowd.
In the end, there is no injustice in the non-speech.
A tree that stands out in the forest will be felled by the wind.
Master Che's virtue brings about a disaster.
The ancients have already passed away, no longer sighing.
For you, for poetry, leaving it to later generations.
Hang's mark soars into the clouds, Hang's mark soars into the clouds, the master's high mark soars into the clouds.
In virtue, how can it be in sinking and obscurity?
A hermit's hut at the foot of the ridge, entrusting solitude.
Asserting a trace, aloof, not entering the secular world.
Sometimes ascending the layered cliffs to gaze,
Not hearing his words, hearing his clear whistling.
At that time, Lu Yu sought out the secluded,
Once entered the blue clouds, preemptively heard the Way.
Taking rain to save from drought, driving the divine dragon,
This and human affairs, how can they be the same?
The mysterious mechanism moves the sprouts of the extraordinary mind,
This is why this public is called Dao Biao.
Sending Zhang Biao Min, the Secretarial Court, to send Zhang Biao Min, the Secretarial Court, one day Confucius came to the foot of the mountain.
Coming to say goodbye, where will he go?
The old garrison of Qingchen has also all arrived at the time, Zhou Ganshi came together, the light carriage and light jade ornaments shining brightly.
Entering the door, he looks at my good complexion.
Holding each other's sleeves under the trees, we followed each other.
Laughing freely, our spirits were lofty.ğŸ”½Looking up, we realized the sun was already leaning to the west.
We brushed off our mats and stayed to spend the night in the mountain dwelling.
Paper quilts and straw mats are truly laughable.
Not considering abundance or simplicity, we just enjoyed the beauty.
We nodded in agreement, not refusing each other's words.
At that time, it was the middle of the second month, when spring is mild.ğŸ”½The long night was bright, with a slight chill.
Our lofty discussions flowed freely, our elegant sentiments matched.
It was like pouring water from one bottle to another, overflowing everywhere.ğŸ”½In an instant, we pushed aside the mats and ordered each other to express our aspirations.
We spoke directly from our hearts, using sincere words.
People's minds are different, just like their faces.
Each of us has been doing our own thing all along.
The clerk suddenly rushed to the center of the seats
and said, I have aspirations, but people do not know me.
The shallow and near-sighted of the present age are not worthy of speaking.
He swallowed his food without speaking, sighing for a long time.
When I was young, I studied the classics with the teacher.
I did not explore the branches and leaves, but delved into the roots and foundations.
The way of emperors can be fully understood.
The doubts about the Zhou dynasty's ancient documents are no more.
Ancient and modern projects value practicality.
The meaning of the text must have a plan in its composition.
How can it be like a child's empty carving?
A painted cake cannot cure hunger in the morning.
For fifteen years, I diligently studied literature.
Whetted my pen and ink, my spirit exhausted.
Long chapters and large scrolls, countless.
Only wanted to support the political order with magnanimity.
Last year, I was appointed to Zhejiang.
Bureaucratic affairs are busy, customs cannot be observed.
Inclined to emulate Wang Xizhi's calligraphy.
A thoroughbred is not suitable for catching mice.
In Qiantang, there are many high officials in the great government.
Compared in rank, I am the lowest.
Meng Ke alone has the vast qi.
Who can roll up their sleeves and lower their brows for long?
What a man values is advancing with the Way.
The blue clouds a thousand miles, one must drive oneself.
Alas, look at me, what am I doing?
He used the shade of the gate as his shelter.
So he excused himself due to illness and withdrew far away.
Suddenly, with hairpins and brocades, there is a difference.
If Dong Sheng of Jiaoxi is to be admired,
Lowering the curtain, persevering, exhausting books and poetry.
Living in leisure, falling into obscurity, much moved.
What moves is the flawed governance of the time.
A humble official with integrity, privately serving himself.
Writing a letter with ten thousand characters, throwing it into the vermilion steps.
The heavenly gate and deep rock are in the northwest.
Stretching the neck, gazing far, the clouds are lofty.
The virtuous sound ultimately does not respond.
Pointlessly revealing the liver and gallbladder, empty tears and snot.
Alas, alas, when I was born, my fate was mistaken.
Not encountering the time,ç”˜ä½šéº.
The dragon and snake hibernating, the inchworm bending.
All things not timely, must be self-soothed.
My family's fields and gardens are in the southern country.
There are also streams and mountains called Wuyi.
The spring water is sweet, the black soil is suitable for farming.
Return to the old farmer to manage the foundation.
I and æ„Ÿä¹‹ heard this saying.
The spirit moves, startling the chin.
Deep planning and foresight cannot be measured.
The ocean has no bottom, the sky has no edge.
In front of the Changhe Gate, countless guests.
Pushing shoulders and feet, vying for the first word.
Warm clothes and full meals, indulging in splendor.
How many outstanding people can be like this?
I invite you to go further and speak with you.
Why bother to be light-hearted and troubled?ğŸ”½Precious things are harvested in winter, hibiscus blooms in the morning.
Many things flourish, some are slow.
I have not heard of Yi Yin's five admonitions to Tang.
The way of Yao and Shun can only be implemented.
The wise and outstanding value the world more than their own bodies.
How can they be busy seeking their own interests?
Moreover, when the barbarians insult the Central Kingdom,
trampling on the two borderlands, turning the earth's skin.
The general's punishment and conquest have not yet been successful.
The hundred thousand troops are exhausted, flags and banners are weary.
In bad years and good years, they are still interspersed.
Wind, rain, frost, and snow are still untimely.
The Son of Heaven is busy with government, having no time to eat.
He also needs talents to help and supplement him.
In the imperial court, there are gentlemen.
How could the wise and intelligent be willing to spare Gao Yao and Kui?
Upholding justice, respecting the great craftsman,
Measuring and cutting the cypress and sandalwood, how could there be any discrepancy?
I love you, sir, for your nature is open and straightforward.
I do not use your teachings to criticize each other.
Facing the wind, a thousand miles apart in the bright moon.
How can I bear to empty my liver and spleen in offering sacrifices?
The vulgar delight in slander, few enjoy goodness.
Cherish your fine reputation and pure integrity, do not let them be damaged.
If the court asks for strategies to pacify the pass,
Who else but you is the foremost virtuous and good?
Ancient meaning, ancient meaning, five poems, one: The wind blows a dot of cloud,
Scattered and random as spring rain,
Sprinkling my pine and cypress grove,
The verdant branches can be picked.
Holding this winter-resistant conduct,
Empty in the hand, chuchu.
No one comes to the secluded valley,
In the evening, with whom can I share my thoughts?
Two: Do not laugh at Zhizhe and Xu,
Solitary and silent, not foolish and ignorant.
Do not lightly look down on Ji and Ruan,
There is pure joy in the mountains and forests.
Human life is merely a hundred years,
Pleasure is little, worry returns in abundance.
All matters are meaningless, short or long.
Nothing compares to making the Way supreme.
You are not a person who scorns the world,
Soaring high, casting off fame and reputation.
You simply reject the conditions within the realm,
Delighting in dwelling on the rocky path with a peaceful mind.
The white clouds fly in the daytime,
Worldly affairs will never correspond.
It is better to understand your sincerity,
Speaking for yourself and giving yourself gifts.
Three times in the clouds, seeing a pair of birds,
Flying high, revealing the sun and moon.ğŸ”½Feathers adorn their patterns,
Soaring and circling, different from hawks and falcons.
Soaring freely, thousands of miles away,
In the end, not looking back at the forest.
The spring wind blows wildly,
Strong wings soar even higher.
The wandering youths on the road,
Glancing at you in a hurry.
Although they have golden bullets,
They dare not shoot, looking sideways.
Thus knowing the resources of uniqueness,
Protecting oneself and surpassing for a long time.
Looking back at the flock of yellow sparrows,
Why are they attached to the dust and dirt?
Four times, it is laughable that the floating clouds are high,
Soaring in the void, obscuring the sun and stars, soaring in the void or supporting the wind, how can it be compared to the fragrance of orchids?
Among the grasses, it naturally has its own fragrance.
It is self-sufficient, and then it is heaven's share.
It does not need your empty spirit.
What is hated by those who cover and obscure?
Why do you linger for a long time?
In the past, there were magnanimous people.
Their wandering traces were often in obscurity.
They cherished the long departure in mountains and forests.
They hid their use and also hid their form.
The foolish valley cannot be reached.
Deeply hidden, it returns to its own peace.
I sigh and also admire this.
In seclusion, I nurture my declining years.
At fifty-five, I encountered a true old man.
He gave me a scroll of writing.
In the deep forest, I met a secluded person.
He gave me an ax and a hoe.
What is the use of an ax and a hoe?
To teach me to nurture my talent and vegetables.
The wild and filthy must be pruned.
To make it flourish naturally.
What is the use of giving the writing?
To teach your mind and body.
Learning must first correct oneself.
Governing oneself and then extending to others.
This intention has auspicious instructions.
Wearing it, one never forgets.
How can those who are confused and ignorant
Mistakenly want to be like him?ğŸ”½Habitually forming a shallow custom,
Few virtues, harboring pretense.
I compose this vulgar language,
Relying on you to transmit it to others.
Visiting the Daoist Li Xian, the Immortal, on Mount Youlong Visiting the Daoist Li Xian, the Immortal, on Mount Youlong The sun rises, the wilderness is bright.
Purely seeking the Way, life is born.ğŸ”½Far away beyond the lake, I leave.
Wandering freely by the clouds, I go.
Autumn is high, the sky is clear.
Fallen leaves fly in all directions.
Riding the wind, I cross the forests and ridges.
I feel my clothes and shoes are light.
From time to time, I hear in the misty distance
The faint wind transmitting the sound of cranes.
I know I am near the immortals.
My thoughts are carefree and pure.
In an instant, I turn into a deep valley.
The purple palace, the flat field of spiritual herbs.
The immortal boy runs to report.
Pine seeds come to welcome at the gate.
Holding sleeves, we speak and laugh.
What we delight in is not worldly feelings.
The man's face is not yet old,
His appearance is already formed by heaven.ğŸ”½Opening the feast, arranging jade grains,
Serving delicacies with purple blossoms.
Entwining like meeting an old friend,
Relaxed, pouring out one's thoughts.
At dusk, reluctantly saying goodbye,
Hesitating, leaning against the mountain railing.
Wishing to make another appointment,
Again worrying about changing the lofty name.
Encountering Feelings, Encountering Feelings, Nine Poems, One: The Seawater is Dark and the Night is Clear.
Autumn colors fill the Penglai and Yingzhou Islands.
There is an old man, the Dragon King of the East Sea.
An iron net covers the coral.
The vastness of wind and clouds is shared.
What is the regretful plan?
If one wants to ask the heavenly people,
Can the bright moon be exchanged?
Two: The Two Immortals in the Jade Capital.
Going and going, how misty and distant.
The jeweled pavilion has twelve stories.
Lingering, floating above the clouds.
The silver waves are the moon's ripples.
Ten thousand acres are immediately ponds and marshes.
When autumn comes, the palace's light
Drifts down to the human world's dawn.
Sometimes the sky is clear and bright.
The smoke and mist obscure the blue birds.
Visible but unattainable.
What I think of is empty and vast.
The three threes are leisurely, Yang holds the halberd.
Recognizing the distant, his talent is extraordinary.
First picking up the mysterious brush of grass.
He is quite ridiculed by people.
The way of Confucius and Mencius is lofty.
I thank you for the perilous and steep.
The jade mirror contains a hidden light.
For a thousand years, it is just flourishing.
I entrust a message to the open-minded scholar.
If you have not reached it, do not sigh and lament.
The mind aspires to value the Way by itself.
The worldly disposition follows along with it.
The green mountains will always be protected.
The white sun can be seen in the upright way.
The lofty appearance surpasses pine and cypress.
The solitary fragrance does not change with the practice.
The four fours are where the heavenlyå¨ does not reach.
The weapons move in the borderlands.
The general displays hiså¨çŒ›.
The heroes' momentum rises along with it.
In confusion, they emerge from the Yuguan Pass.
In awe, they are in the autumn scenery.
The white horse penetrates the yellow clouds.
The clear frost is strict and severe.
The young and strong guards of the imperial guards.
Do not be too happy with many tasks.
Fond of martial arts, not the heart of a ruler.
Using troops is unavoidable.
Entrusting words to the Flying General.
Wondrous strategy should be incomparable.
The ambition lies in repaying the ruler's kindness.
How could it be for dying over gold?
A man's body is entrusted to the state.
Being magnanimous and upright should be like this.
Rather let the Grand Historian record it.
Lightly laughing at the son of Lu Lian.
Five times five, the vastness between heaven and earth.
The flowing light is so fleeting.
I once heard of the people of the ancient past.
I have never seen the sun's orb stop.
Talent sinks in the clouds of the horizon.
Returning to the mulberry tree in the east.
The mountain colors are dark in sorrow.
The sky's form is dawn in a dream.
How could one know that Emperor Mu
Had a divine dragon-horse as his chariot.
Traveling a myriad of miles, riding the wind.
Again heading towards the Jade Terrace.
Surpassing the immortals in the distance.
For what reason is this principle so?
Not heading towards the long years of Yao.
Forever making it stay in the human world.
Six times six, where are the guests with crowns and canopies?
The lofty spirit is arrogant.
Day after day, rushing to the two palaces.
Dashing past the Wei Bridge.
The golden reins sound in the clouds.
The painted candles burn in the moonlight. Walking on the heavenly road, lofty and soaring in the jade realm.
How within this limited space,
Suddenly far away from the human world.ğŸ”½Long parting with the brocade robes,
The prince goes to court.
One bow and one look up,
Many honors and much worry.
White hair grows at the temples,
Red face withers in the mirror.
How could he know under the pine and cypress trees,
The secluded person is always in deep silence.
All matters are light and carefree,
Allowing long rambling while lying down.
Vast and boundless between heaven and earth,
Who asks about Emperor Yu and Emperor Yao?
Facing the wind, a clear whistle,
What is the use of Prince Qiao?
Seven times seven, the empty void clears the distant smoke,
The clear color contains the autumn scenery.
Thinking of you, I often wander around.

Gazing at the thousand peaks, gazing alone, the bright moon just beginning to round, able to illuminate the beauty's shadow, the beauty comes or does not come, the clouds and mist vast in the forests and hills.
The spiritual place of the eight-eight pine and cypress.
The weeds are also equally luxuriant.
I wish to obtain within the region.
The human mind is again pure and simple.
The Cangwu and Kuaiji regions.
No longer have tombs and mounds.
The six directions have no one who understands the sound.
The green mountains have a road to return to.
People cherish their rosy complexions.
The wise one always looks after each other.
Last night's dew on the flower stand.
Who does not resent the end of autumn?
The nine-nine year, leisurely like Zi Ling.
Far and vast, with a vast vessel.
The old friend is honored as the ruler.
The white colt will not arrive.ğŸ”½Addicted to leisure, longing for the green pond.
Soaring high, playing with fragrant bait.
The green mountains sail with the white clouds.
For ten thousand years, entrusting lofty intentions.
The Marquis does not know the way.
At first, he also resented the lofty will.
Why does he belittle the kings and nobles?
Their minds transcend heaven and earth.
Because of pity for the Lou and Hu tribes,
Why do they attach themselves to power and influence?
Wandering between the Ji and Guan areas,
Bowing to the examples of the horses and oxen.
The ancient Way of the August Emperor,
Sentient beings are bound by themselves.
It is better to return home,
Riding the wind, brushing the long sleeves.
Thinking of Lingyue while wandering in Yue, I also show it to the gentlemen of Kai in Shanyin. I am tired of seeing the noisy human realm,
While wandering in the clear, I think of Lingyue.
In the southeast, there are millions of mountains,
Floating green, filling the vast and deep.
From ancient times, the scenery in the mirror,
The most outstanding in the human world.
The moon is clear, changing Goose Creek,
Clouds rise, hiding the book cave.
If a traveler is like a drifting weed,
Suddenly parting with an old friend,
Letters have not yet been sent,
And the fragrant grass is already said to be resting.
What is sad is the difficulty of the road ahead,
Looking up and down, damaging one's reputation and principles.
The wild geese want to fly east,
Sending a message to Xie Mingyue.
Early Autumn Poem Early Autumn Poem Last night, the mountain house was cold.
A single leaf of the paulownia tree fluttered in the golden well.
The long sky was like water, hiding the clouds.
The bright moon contained radiance, changing the autumn scenery.
The cassia branches bloomed, the wind fluttered.
Who was on the high tower, playing the jade flute?
In the human world, I did not see the raft ascending to the Han River.
In the heavens, I will watch the magpies form a bridge.
Where is the young man who is away on campaign?
The white dew wets his clothes, but he has not returned home yet.
By the sea, there is no longer the home of Mother of the Drifting Child.
In Jiangnan, who will meet with the prince?
Wandering in the moonlight, I can only sigh for a long time.
Our disciples, since ancient times, have found it difficult to understand the melody.
I want to climb the high tower and ask the bright moon.
Why doesn't the bright moon illuminate people's hearts?
The group of sages staying in the mountains composed a poem about staying at Sunset Cliff. The gentle breeze is still at the end of the forest.
The red sun is below the cliff.
The bright moon has already appeared full.
The white clouds have not returned much.
You should associate with monkeys and cranes.
Deep, not dark, with pine trees and vines.
If you do not bring rain,
What will happen in a drought year?
Gazing at the Zhejiang River in the Evening Gazing at the Zhejiang River in the Evening The evening colors are boundless.
Autumn sky blends with the water.
A single sail flies beyond the birds.
The new moon sets by the tide.
The mountain shapes across the prefecture are small.
Swallowing the land of Wu, the position is biased.
How many people come and go, growing old?
Early and late, the boat at the ferry.
Inscription on Jingshan Temple Inscription on Jingshan Temple The verdant peaks rise above the other mountains,
Their towering presence reaching to the heavens.
Clouds obscure the path of flying birds,
Rain emerges from the ancient dragon's pool.
Monks dwell in the deep clouds' stillness,
Incense blends with the distant mist.
Humans cannot reach this place,
Yet the terraces and halls are always clear in autumn.
Lang, the retired vice minister, Lang, the retired vice minister, in his prime, uniquely lofty, wishing to conceal his light.
The Way is supreme, he desires to hide his light.
With white hair, he bids farewell to the enlightened ruler.
In the green mountains, he yearns for his old hometown.
The medicine fields can accommodate the arrival of cranes.
I fear the clouds will hide the path for chanting.
I love even more to lie down in the Chan forest.
From time to time, I come to brush the stone bed.
Early plum blossoms in the mountains, early plum blossoms in the mountains, towering, reflecting the evening scenery.
Bright and clear, emerging from the forest's end.
Small garden, connected with the misty clouds.
Solitary fragrance, braving the cold snow.
Humans have yet to see it.
In the world beyond things, it is the earliest to be seen.
I only wish to compare it to qiongyu.
How can it surpass peonies?
Sailing on the Ruo River, sailing on the Ruo River, riding the spring breeze across the waters of Yue.
The boat window is closed and then opened again.
Good mountains, passing by the shore,
Rushing rain, falling flowers coming.
The reflection of the shore, woodcutters crossing,
The sound of singing, laundry women turning back.
Endless meaning in Canglang,
At dusk, even more leisurely and carefree.
Writing in Mao Youzhang's garden pavilion, writing in Mao Youzhang's garden pavilion, loving this garden forest's goodness.
Coming again, the flowers and trees flourish.
The visitors are drunk and do not leave.
The secluded birds speak at all times.
Smoke and mist connect with fragrant grass.
In spring, I float on a green pond.
Pine and bamboo are not worldly sounds.
Wandering sons idly make appointments.
In the evening spring at the mountain pavilion, in the evening spring at the mountain pavilion, the mountain pavilion is quiet in the evening.
The forest rocks are naturally rugged.
The dog goes away barking at people's words.
The flowers fly, indulging the birds' chirping.ğŸ”½The clear mist permeates the lush grass.
The warm sun spreads over the tall pines.
I am even happier with the full moon.
The clear light shines on the green cliffs.
Sending off myself, sending off myself, sitting quietly and looking at the bamboo again.
Wandering leisurely also matches the woodcutter.
The mind of the Way should be present.
The affairs of life should be without reliance.
When guests leave, the clear talk is little.
In recent years, there are many white hairs.
Carelessly using Zhidun's brush,
I am leisurely composing a carefree poem.
In the summer days without rain, in the summer days without rain, in the mountains it is painful to have no rain.
Day after day I look up at the clouds and mist.
Small heat followed by great heat.
The deep valley becomes a shallow valley.
The spring dries up connecting with the bottom of the well.
The earth is hot and the vegetable gardens are parched.
There is no way to ask about the will of Heaven.
In vain thinking of the crying of water birds (a folk saying that when water birds cry, it will rain).
At the end of the year, writing about my feelings. At the end of the year, writing about my feelings. The north wind has just changed, becoming cold.
The morning sun is about to give warmth.
The southern country is still far away.
On the eastern mountain, the year is coming to an end.ğŸ”½Floating life passes by in a flash.
How can one stop the fading of youthful appearance?
Entrusting to others in the human world.
The confusion and splendor are even more to be enlightened to.
Walking in the mountains early. Walking in the mountains early. The mountain in front has rained overnight.
Walking alone in the spring mud.
The sun is about to rise on the horizon.
The rooster is crowing in the farmer's house.
Where the solitary smoke rises.
In the vast wilderness, the view is low in the distance.
Still happy to meet a woodcutter.
Together we cross several streams.
Returning in the evening by the lake. Returning in the evening by the lake. The thin wandering in the human world is over.
The intention to return seeks the old hidden place.
On the spring shore, the walk is not yet finished.
The setting sun is about to end the view.
The misty light is faint at the mountain's edge.
The reflection of the sky is near by the water's side.
I cherish the true tranquility of this place.
My clear singing leads on and on.
In the last spring month, I send this to a friend. In the last spring month, on the lake without smoke, the day is bright.
It is the time of Cold Food Festival for humans.
The spring changes easily between sunny and cloudy.
The flowers and moon are difficult to match in timing.
I am not yet afraid of the chaos of green frogs.
I am first worried about the withering of purple bracken.
The cloudy mountains are gradually getting hot.
Do not delay in coming to visit.
Thinking of Chan Master Shan Yue of Lake Lei, thinking of Chan Master Shan Yue of Lake Lei. I have heard of the place where Chan Master An practices Chan.
Deep vines obscure the creek.
The clear gibbon howls in the midst of meditation.
The hidden bird perches by my seat.
The shadow of the clouds changes with morning and evening.
The peaks of the mountains are far and near, yet the same.
I do not know who asks about the Dharma.
Standing in the snow on the night of the river in Jiangxi.
Seeing off a guest returning to the northern capital, written on the road. Seeing off a guest returning to the northern capital, written on the road. Seeing off Yang Zi at the northern suburbs.
The sun sets, returning to his old home.
The muddy road is moist until dawn.
The dark moon approaches the remaining spring.
Mulberry and hemp are green in the rain.
People and smoke are sparse outside the pass.
Still, I see the customs and habits.
My intention to return mixes with the woodcutters and fishermen.
The second rhyme of Wuji's response to the invitation to Chengtian again, carrying the order to return and humbly decline.
I know your deep intentions.
The green mountains are where you should hide.
My white hair wants to find peace of mind.
I will wait for the rainy season again.
Why not pass by Huzhou?
The murmuring stream joins the river water.
In the sixth month, it is enough for clear sounds.
Returning to the mountain hut in the evening Returning to the mountain hut in the evening, I return to the secluded abode in the late evening.
Walking slowly, there is nothing to compare.
The sun sets and the moon is still clear.
The mountains are empty and the water is even more still.
I vaguely hear the distant bell.
Tranquil, it is on the western peak.
I will tell those who aspire to the heights.
Come here to leave the dusty world.
Reading books, reading books, reading books, why do I read them when I am old?
I read them again just to cover my eyes.
Although this intention is casual,
The lofty feelings are entrusted to the limitless.
Mistakenly polishing the mind of a thousand years,
Turning over and over, forgetting meals several times.
Not knowing where the white clouds go,
Spring is quiet in the mountains in the evening.
Seeing Off the Recluse of Lu Returning to Mount Lu Seeing Off the Recluse of Lu Returning to Mount Lu The affairs of the world are like a cycle.
Right and wrong will never end.
I admire you returning to the deep mountains,
Letting others criticize the lesser recluse.
The Yellow Crane has already flown high,
The white clouds leave, not nearby.
The heavenly sounds return to the desolate,
Which peak plays the clear strings?
Returning to Mount Nanyue, Writing about Current Events Returning to Mount Nanyue, Writing about Current Events In late years, returning to the stone room, cold.
The pine and wisteria are secluded and quiet, I wander on my own.
I only know that in the forest, a year has passed,
I do not see the myriad affairs in the human world are difficult.
There is a poem inviting recluses, inscribed on a stone record.
Without explanation, I look at the times.
